Text: The Sri Lankan sambar deer ("Rusa unicolor unicolor") is a subspecies of sambar deer that lives in Sri Lanka.

Text: Sri Lankan sambar deer:  Large males weight up to 270–280 kg.

<Text: Sri Lankan sambar deer:  Sri Lankan sambar live in lowland dry forests and mountain forests.>

Text: Sri Lankan sambar deer:  Large herds of sambar deer roam the Horton Plains National Park, where it is the most common large mammal.
